meta.description: Context Sensitive Help (CSH) for table tt_content

languageKey.label: Show article in the 'Newest content elements'
Check this, if you want to display this article in the plugin 'Newest content elements (NCE)'.
Short article (defaults to 'bodytext')
Start time - only for Newest-/RSS-/Atom-Plugin
Value must equal or be greater than 'access->starttime'. If value is empty, it will use value of 'access->starttime' and then the value of db-field 'crdate'
tt_content:starttime
Update time - only for Newest-/RSS-/Atom-Plugin
Stop time - only for Newest-/RSS-/Atom-Plugin
Value must equal or be lower than 'access->endtime'. If value is empty, it will use value of 'access->endtime'
tt_content:endtime
